code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import ReactStars from"react-rating-stars-component";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/products/").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProducts(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel",children:products.map((product,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product},idx))})]});}function ProductCard(_ref){let{product}=_ref;const[selectedColor,setSelectedColor]=useState("yellow");const handleColorChange=color=>{setSelectedColor(color);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.images[selectedColor],alt:`${product.name} - ${selectedColor}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price," USD"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"selected-color",children:[selectedColor.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+selectedColor.slice(1)," Gold"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rating-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactStars,{count:5,value:product.rating,size:24,edit:false,activeColor:"#ffcc00",isHalf:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rating-text",children:product.rating.toFixed(1)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"color-swatches",children:Object.keys(product.images).map(color=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.images[color],alt:color,onClick:()=>handleColorChange(color),className:`swatch ${selectedColor===color?"active":""}`},color))})]});}export default App;
